subject: Re: [junit] Re: setup question
msgSnippet: ... Put quotation marks around %PATH%. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603 Let s write software
messageBody:
Aaron R. Short wrote:

> I tried what you said but got back another error.
> Typed: java -classpath %PATH% junit.textui.TestRunner
> junit.samples.AllTests
>
> Got back: Exception in thread "main"
> java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
> files\sdb\programs\bin;c:program

Put quotation marks around %PATH%.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
